name: Water Gun Balloon Game
card_text: As Water Gun Balloon Game enters the battlefield, each player puts a pop! counter on "0." Whenever a player casts a spell, move that player's pop! counter up one. Whenever a player's pop! counter hits "5," that player creates a 5/5 pink Giant Teddy Bear creature token and resets all pop! counters to "0."

name: Underdome
card_text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to pay silver-bordered costs.
